```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=TRUE}
library(readxl)

amita_final_all <- read_excel(
  "LF97_GermainH_20191015_Final results.xlsx", 
  sheet = "Final results all")
grep("Abundance Ratio", colnames(amita_final_all))

```

```{r}
for_heatmap <- amita_final_all[, c(1, grep("Abundance Ratio", colnames(amita_final_all)), grep("stat", amita_final_all))]
cbind(gsub("(\\(\\w+ *\\)) / (\\(\\w+ *\\))", "\\2 / \\1", colnames(for_heatmap), fixed = F), colnames(for_heatmap))

```
